projects.title: Student Competition Robot Design for Robotics Instructor
projects.description: To design a modular, durable, and easy-to-assemble robot prototype for a Japanese robotics teacher. The model serves as a training tool and testing platform for student competitions and classroom demonstrations.
projects.objective: To design a modular, durable, and easy-to-assemble robot prototype for a Japanese robotics teacher. The model serves as a training tool and testing platform for student competitions and classroom demonstrations.
projects.engineeringInsight:
This project demonstrates Enginaro's commitment to education-focused engineering. The robot is now used
 by a Japanese robotics teacher to challenge and educate students through modular, hands-on design
 thinking.
scopeOfWork: Mechanical design and layout using SolidWorks
Chassis design for obstacle navigation and load-bearing
Track system and motor placement optimization
Provision for modular arm or tool attachment
Exporting CAD models for student access and test assembly
challenges: Designing for modularity to allow tool changes
Ensuring stability and durability during student handling
Optimizing gear ratios and chain drive placement
Balancing cost-efficiency with classroom scalability
deliverables: Fully modeled robot chassis and drive system
Documentation for student assembly and part functions
Images and an animated walkthrough for virtual classroom use

projects.title: Autonomous Drone for Image-Guided Navigation
projects.description:
Design and develop a fully functional drone capable of autonomous flight using onboard image
 processing systems.
projects.objective: Design and develop a fully functional drone capable of autonomous flight using onboard image processing systems
projects.engineeringInsight:
The drone is optimized for visual tracking and autonomous navigation. It features a robust frame
 structure, custom-designed to accommodate modular sensor mounts and lightweight electronics,
 ensuring responsive image-based control
scopeOfWork: Structural drone design for balanced flight
Electronic integration for autonomous operation
Test flight planning and sensor feedback tuning
challenges: Achieving stable flight without remote input.
Integrating a camera module with onboard processing.
Reducing frame weight while maintaining rigidity.
deliverables: Complete 3D CAD model
Electronics layout and circuit integration
Functional test flight video and report

projects.title: Electric Bicycle Design with PLC Integration
projects.description:
Design and develop an electric bicycle integrating a mechanical structure with programmable control
 for efficient personal transportation.
projects.objective:
Design and develop an electric bicycle integrating a mechanical structure with programmable control
 for efficient personal transportation.
projects.engineeringInsight:
This project emphasizes sustainable transport with customizable control. It features modular
 construction for serviceability, and PLC-driven logic for adaptive motor control based on the road
 conditions and rider input
scopeOfWork: Complete mechanical design of frame, transmission, and seating
Integration of a PLC-based control system for speed and battery monitoring
CAD assembly, electrical layout, and performance planning
challenges: Designing a lightweight yet durable frame
Integrating PLC in compact geometry
Ensuring battery management with minimal electronic noise
deliverables: Full 3D CAD assembly and production drawings
PLC program logic for the control system
System prototype ready for urban testing

projects.title: Sensor Enclosure Design for Solar Application
projects.description: Develop a robust and thermally stable sensor enclosure specifically engineered for solar-powered systems, ensuring compatibility with cost-effective, scalable mass production methods
projects.objective: Design a thermally stable sensor enclosure for solar-powered systems suitable for mass production.
projects.engineeringInsight:
The enclosure integrates dual flow channels to allow heat escape while protecting sensor stability.
Compact geometry and optimized vent placement allow real-time environmental exposure with reliable data acquisition
scopeOfWork: Develop a 3D model for the solar sensor enclosure
Perform thermal simulations for heat regulation
Engineer internal supports and sealing mechanisms
Ensure manufacturability and outdoor durability
challenges: Designing for continuous heat exposure under direct sunlight
Achieving precision internal fit for sensor hardware
Maintaining sealing performance in plastic housing for IP-rated conditions
deliverables: Complete CAD design (3D + technical drawings)
Thermal simulation report
Manufacturing-ready files for injection molding

projects.title: Heat Exchanger Design & Thermal Simulation
projects.description:
To design a pressure-rated heat exchanger system and validate its mechanical integrity using FEA.
Simulation focused on stress, displacement, and thermal effects under real operating conditions.
projects.objective:
To design a pressure-rated heat exchanger system and validate its mechanical integrity using FEA.
Simulation focused on stress, displacement, and thermal effects under real operating conditions.
projects.engineeringInsight:
This simulation demonstrated Enginaro’s ability to combine detailed CAD design with structural simulation
to ensure the real-world viability and certification readiness of pressure-handling components.
scopeOfWork: 3D design of cylindrical shell and bolted flanged connections
Setup of boundary conditions and internal pressure loading
Static structural analysis for stress and displacement
Color-map plotting of deformation zones and safety factors
Compliance with European pressure vessel directives
challenges: Handling multi-axial load distribution across the shell/flange geometry
Ensuring safe deformation limits under variable pressures
Validating bolted joint behavior at flange connections
Maintaining weight and manufacturability for client standards
deliverables: Final CAD model of heat exchanger with assembly drawings
Simulation results with annotated color plots
Report with safety factors and design compliance summary
STL file exports and PDF documentation

projects.title: Vision-Based Inspection Conveyor System
projects.description:
To design a fully automated inspection conveyor system integrated with industrial vision cameras.
The system provides real-time visual quality control during inline processing.
projects.objective:
To design a fully automated inspection conveyor system integrated with industrial vision cameras.
The system provides real-time visual quality control during inline processing.
projects.engineeringInsight:
This project showcases Enginaro’s strength in combining mechanical automation with smart sensing.
A complete solution for in-line visual inspection with seamless mechanical and vision coordination.
scopeOfWork: Design of modular conveyor platform with camera mounting support
Integration of enclosure with adjustable lighting for image accuracy
Setup for automated product handling and rejection mechanism
Coordination with vision system software (VisionX)
Vibration-free, adjustable frame design for camera alignment
challenges: Isolating camera mounts from conveyor vibration
Providing controlled lighting in transparent enclosure
Designing for both hardware and vision alignment precision
Enabling easy access for cleaning and camera calibration
deliverables: CAD assembly with detailed vision module integration
Drawings for enclosure, mountings, and the automation system
Camera bracket and cable routing plan
Client-ready visualization renders and manufacturing pack

projects.title: Game Asset Design: Stylized Boat and Environment
projects.description:
To design a visually distinct boat model for a strategy-based mobile game set on a river map.
Design supports custom textures, modular extensions, and game physics for dynamic interaction.
projects.objective:
To design a visually distinct boat model for a strategy-based mobile game set on a river map.
Design supports custom textures, modular extensions, and game physics for dynamic interaction.
projects.engineeringInsight:
This project highlights Enginaro’s ability to support creative industries through engineering-quality modeling
tailored for performance, aesthetic consistency, and interactive storytelling.
scopeOfWork: Modeling low-poly boat assets optimized for Unity/Unreal Engine
Design variations for multiple ship types (attack, trade, scout)
Design of environmental props including boatyard and river segments
Lighting and rendering for stylized visuals
Asset packaging for game engine integration
challenges: Clean silhouette readability for mobile screen sizes
Low-poly count (<2k tris) for real-time performance
Color-coded parts for gameplay identification (e.g., sails, turrets)
Modular asset system for building river levels and docking areas
deliverables: 3D model files (FBX/OBJ)
Basic textures and AO map
Environment prototypes (boatyard, dock, terrain)

projects.title: Server Rack Enclosure Design (Sheet Metal)
projects.description:
To design a custom server rack enclosure optimized for airflow, durability, and modular electronics integration.
The goal was to meet the client’s mechanical, thermal, and serviceability standards for high-density server rooms.
projects.industry: IT Infrastructure / Data Centers / Industrial Networking
projects.objective:
To design a custom server rack enclosure optimized for airflow, durability, and modular electronics integration.
The goal was to meet the client’s mechanical, thermal, and serviceability standards for high-density server rooms.
projects.engineeringInsight: This project demonstrated Enginaro’s ability to deliver precision-driven sheet metal products tailored to global tech infrastructure. The server enclosure featured high-performance ventilation, durability, and modular customization for next-gen server deployments.
scopeOfWork: Complete 3D design of enclosure and frame structure using parametric modeling
Modular design with multiple door types (perforated, solid) and quick-release latches
Sheet metal bending, hole patterns for ventilation, and mounting rails for server hardware
Assembly constraints for cable management and cooling duct integration
Designed for easy production via laser cutting and CNC bending
challenges: Balancing structural rigidity with cooling airflow
Designing punch-ready ventilation patterns while maintaining panel strength
Optimizing hinge placement and door clearance
Meeting IT safety standards and rack compatibility specs
deliverables: 3D CAD model and fabrication drawings
DXF profiles for laser cutting
3D rendered visualizations for client approval
Detailed assembly instructions and BOM

projects.title: Electric Trimmer: Design, Electronics & Prototyping
projects.description: To design a fully functional electric trimmer from scratch, covering mechanical layout, blade mechanics, PCB integration, and final prototyping.
projects.objective: To design a fully functional electric trimmer from scratch, covering mechanical layout, blade mechanics, PCB integration, and final prototyping.
projects.engineeringInsight: This project showcased Enginaro’s ability to combine precision mechanical design with custom electronics integration, delivering an innovative and manufacturable grooming device prototype.
scopeOfWork: 3D mechanical design of outer casing and internal layout
Gear system and blade actuation mechanism with safety spacing
Design and integration of battery, DC motor, and PCB
Charging port layout and toggle switch design
DFM support for injection molding
Final prototype assembly and testing
challenges: Miniaturization of components to fit ergonomic casing
Vibration control and user comfort during operation
Material choice for blade alignment and casing durability
Tight integration of electronics within a compact shell
deliverables: 3D CAD files with exploded and assembled views
PCB Gerber files and electrical schematics
Fully functional physical prototype trimmer delivered to the client
Documentation for manufacturing and electronics sourcing

projects.title: Smart Coffee Maker: Full Internal Design
projects.description: To design a compact dual-cup coffee brewing machine, covering mechanical structure, internal water pathways, heat management, and interface design.
projects.objective: To design a compact dual-cup coffee brewing machine, covering mechanical structure, internal water pathways, heat management, and interface design.
projects.engineeringInsight: This project highlights Enginaro’s capability in appliance design, combining functionality, form, and manufacturability for consumer kitchen products.
scopeOfWork: Complete CAD design using Fusion 360 for housing and internals
Modular cartridge system for water inlet, brewing chamber, and drip trays
Heat coil integration, pump chamber layout, and nozzle outlet path
Ergonomic interface zone with digital controls and LED indicators
Design for injection molding with separate shell sections
challenges: Designing compact pathways for water flow and pressure build-up
Ensuring internal component access for assembly and maintenance
Steam management and housing insulation placement
Fitting a dual-cup layout within a minimal countertop footprint
deliverables: Fully detailed 3D model with all internal components
Exploded views and manufacturing reference
Bill of Materials (BOM) and technical documentation

projects.title: Folding Hand Fan Mold Design & Fabrication
projects.description: To design and manufacture a high-precision steel mold for a traditional folding hand fan, suitable for mass production using injection molding techniques.
projects.objective: To design and manufacture a high-precision steel mold for a traditional folding hand fan, suitable for mass production using injection molding techniques.
projects.engineeringInsight: This project reflects Enginaro’s manufacturing expertise in mold design, highlighting precision, finish quality, and functional aesthetics, tailored to high-volume production tooling.
scopeOfWork: Complete CAD modeling of the fan mold cavity and core using SolidWorks
Designing airflow-consistent rib patterns and surface detailing
CNC-compatible CAM path planning and electrode clearance considerations
Mold base, ejection system, and runner layout design
Manufacturing using CNC milling and finishing techniques
challenges: Achieving uniform fine rib spacing with high surface fidelity
Toolpath optimization to maintain symmetry and reduce machining marks
Accurate split-line placement to avoid flash during molding
Incorporating venting slots without compromising aesthetic detailing
deliverables: Final mold assembly including base plate, cavity-core, guide pins
Machined mold block with polishing-ready finish
CAM setup sheets and machining strategy documentation
Prototype test results and mold maintenance guide

projects.title: PET Bottle Blow Mold Design & Fabrication
projects.description: To develop a precision-machined mold for PET bottle blow molding, ensuring accurate volume formation, neck finish, and durability under repetitive production cycles.
projects.objective: To develop a precision-machined mold for PET bottle blow molding, ensuring accurate volume formation, neck finish, and durability under repetitive production cycles.
projects.engineeringInsight: This project showcases Enginaro’s expertise in precision mold making, where detailed form, manufacturing discipline, and part lifecycle are tightly engineered to meet industrial-scale packaging demands.
scopeOfWork: 3D modeling of bottle profile and mold cavity using SolidWorks
Mold core and cavity separation with undercut-free parting design
Neck thread and base structure formation based on the client bottle sample
CNC machining of hardened steel mold with fine surface finish
Assembly alignment and vent hole integration for air evacuation
challenges: Maintaining high fidelity of neck threading for cap compatibility
Managing blow expansion tolerances for consistent bottle shape
Ensuring mold durability under high-cycle conditions
Avoiding flow marks or flashing during high-pressure air injection
deliverables: Fully machined mold set (core and cavity) with polished internal geometry
CNC operation sheets and machining strategies
Trial-tested PET bottle samples for dimension validation
Maintenance guide for long-term tool use

projects.title: L-Joint Mold Design & Fabrication for injection mold
projects.description: To develop a robust injection mold for producing L-shaped pipe joints, ensuring tight dimensional tolerances and a smooth internal flow path for industrial use.
projects.objective: To develop a robust injection mold for producing L-shaped pipe joints, ensuring tight dimensional tolerances and a smooth internal flow path for industrial use.
projects.engineeringInsight: This project reinforces Enginaro’s competence in manufacturing injection tooling for complex pipe fittings, where internal consistency and mechanical precision are mission-critical.
scopeOfWork: 3D modeling of the L-joint profile with precise flow channel geometry
Core–cavity mold design with multi-part ejection clearance
Design optimization to avoid part warping and air traps
CNC machining of hardened tool steel with mirror-finish cavity zones
Fitting the trial sample and dimensional inspection
challenges: Ensuring concentric alignment of pipe ends during part ejection
Minimizing shrinkage defects in thick-walled elbow zones
Designing robust cooling channel paths for fast cycle time
Preventing flash formation around the tight radius section
deliverables: Fully finished mold set ready for injection molding
Technical drawings and CNC operation strategy
Mold maintenance and troubleshooting guide
First sample L-joint validation with customer-provided gauges

projects.title: Yoghurt Spoon Mold Design & Manufacturing
projects.description: To design and manufacture a multi-cavity injection mold for producing lightweight, single-use yoghurt spoons with a smooth surface finish and consistent shape.
projects.objective: To design and manufacture a multi-cavity injection mold for producing lightweight, single-use yoghurt spoons with a smooth surface finish and consistent shape.
projects.engineeringInsight: This project exemplifies Enginaro’s precision moldmaking expertise in food-grade plastic products, highlighting efficient tooling layout and high-volume manufacturing readiness.
scopeOfWork: Precise 3D modeling of ergonomic spoon geometry
Mold layout for 4-cavity symmetrical configuration
Gating system design with central runner and optimized flow balance
Mirror-finish cavity machining to eliminate post-processing
Trial molding with sample validation
challenges: Maintaining uniform fill in all four cavities
Achieving smooth spoon surfaces without post-polishing
Avoiding short shots in narrow handle zones
Designing for quick cooling and ejection cycles
deliverables: Ready-to-use 4-cavity mold plate
Technical drawings and CAM programming files
Prototype plastic spoons for QA testing
Maintenance guidelines for long mold life

projects.title: Kohu-Bath Packing Machine Design Hygienic and Efficient Packing
projects.description: To design a fully automated machine for hygienic and efficient packing of "Kohu-Bath" - a traditional Sri Lankan herbal rice dish - for commercial-scale operations, including international export readiness.
projects.objective: To design a fully automated machine for hygienic and efficient packing of "Kohu-Bath" - a traditional Sri Lankan herbal rice dish - for commercial-scale operations, including international export readiness.
projects.engineeringInsight: This project highlighted Enginaro's ability to blend traditional food culture with modern design automation, creating a robust, export-ready solution. It also served as a benchmark for future projects involving robotic and semi-automated food-grade machines
scopeOfWork: Complete machine design
Structural frame modeling and ergonomic bin layout
Functional simulation of conveyor flow and packaging mechanisms
Strength analysis for load-bearing frames
3D rendering for presentation and manufacturing
challenges: Designing a stable, food-safe frame while ensuring modularity
Handling movement control and part sorting in a compact footprint
Ensuring structural rigidity for bin support and mechanical arm integration
Minimizing assembly complexity for on-site installation
deliverables: Detailed 3D CAD assembly and exploded views
Manufacturing-ready technical drawings
Stress analysis reports
Client-approved concept renderings for investor presentation
Final model optimized for fabrication and hygiene compliance
